reviews.review_msg: Max is a nice guy, he's willing to answer questions. However, the content that he teaches in lecture is not very helpful for assignments and tests. His lectures are devoted to teaching concepts and theory however when it comes to solving physics, he rarely does it in class.

BRO JUST take it with him! he does not assume you know everything but rather he teaches you everything whether u know it or not. AND PLEASE GO TO HIS OFFICE HOURS HE IS AWSOME and doesn't judge even if u have no idea what anything is ( AKA MOMENTS) :) the best prof fr fr

I love Prof max he is hands down one of my fav profs this sem. Super nice and caring and always ready to answer all of your questions and if you need help he is more than happy to give you all the help you need. Exams are super fair and everything he taught in lec. 10/10 take this class with him if u have a chance u will not regret it
